message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IT, cs.ST, cs.SI 

The paper proposes a supervised machine learning approach to infer the existence of a directed causal link between two variables in multivariate settings. This involves using statistical descriptors to identify asymmetry in conditional (in)dependence relations between the members of the Markov blankets of two variables causally connected. This work is closely related to topics in machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), information theory (cs.IT), statistics (cs.ST), and social and information networks (cs.SI).
